worms.model

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • worms.model.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to create, manage and represent a world in the game.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Kristof Achten GitHub: https://github.com/Divyak156/OGPProject.git StudentNr: r0462748 - 1ste Bachelor informatica

    • Constructor Detail

      • World

        @Raw
public World(double width,
         double height,
         boolean[][] passable,
         java.util.Random random)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor to create this world according to the parameters.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of this world.
        height - The height of this world.
        passable - The boolean containing all the passable areas of this world.
        random - The random generator of this world.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The dimension are valid, random was null, or the Passable Map was null. | random == null || passable == null || !validWidth(width) || !validHeight(height);

    • Method Detail

      • validWidth

        public boolean validWidth(double xWidth)
        Returns whether the provided width is valid.
        Parameters:
        xWidth - The width that is to be checked for validity.
        Returns:
        True if the width is a number and beween 0 and MAX_VALUE. | (!Double.isNaN(xWidth) && 0 <= xWidth && xWidth <= MAX_VALUE;

      • validHeight

        public boolean validHeight(double yHeight)
        Returns whether the provided height is valid.
        Parameters:
        yHeight - The height that is to be checked for validity.
        Returns:
        True if the height is a number and beween 0 and MAX_VALUE. | (!Double.isNaN(yHeight) && 0 <= yHeight && yHeight <= MAX_VALUE;

      • isImpassable

        @Model
public boolean isImpassable(double x,
                         double y,
                         double radius)
        Tells us whether an area is passable for an object or not.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate where we are going to check.
        y - The y-coordinate where we are going to check.
        radius - The radius of the object that wants to pass.
        Returns:
        True if the area provided by the parameters can't be passed through.

      • objectInWorld

        public boolean objectInWorld(double x,
                    double y,
                    double radius)
        Check whether an object is still in the world or not.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate of this object.
        y - y-coordinate of this object.
        radius - Radius of this object.
        Returns:
        True if the object is outside of the game-world.

      • isAdjacent

        public boolean isAdjacent(double x,
                 double y,
                 double radius)
        Checks if an area is next to an impassable area of the world.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate.
        y - The y-coordinate.
        radius - The radius
        Returns:
        True if the area is next to, within 0.1 times the radius, of an impassable area and therefor passable. | (!isImpassable(x, y, radius) && isImpassable(x, y, radius*1.1));
